caption: Quality food options
Been a customer here over 20 years. Great food, great selection even better staff

It's a deli. Many different authentic italian items you can purchase. Like ravioli, pastas, salami and cheeses. The sandwich (the Godfather) wasn't as good as I expected, but for the price and convenience it was worth it. One the other hand the pot pie was way better than expected. Seems "homemade" crust was flaky with great flavor for $6 or 7$. Definitely recommend. I will be going back to tates other things.
Sorrisos is by far my favorite deli in Astoria. The ingredients are always fresh and the food is always incredible.

Having to cat sit nearby for a friend, I finally got the opportunity to go to the lesser known area of Astoria past Steinway. Sorrisos was my first stop when I was hungry! Absolutely incredible place. Everyone in Astoria should go!

Old school Italian deli. Try the house-made soppresatta. Got some parsley and cheese pork sausage which looks amazing. Can't wait to go back and try their sandwiches. Good italian meats, uncooked pork and chicken products, pre-made lunch/dinner foods. This type of place is being replaced by fancy new shops that are underwhelming. This is quite the opposite. Support the old local businesses that made Astoria what it is!

An Italian Salumeria (deli) with history. Its sandwiches and food are tasty and made with care. It has various types of cheeses and Italian goods to meet your needs. Its cheese tastes fresh and rich. It taught me what a real cheese is supposed to taste like. Frank is a nice and friendly guy who works hard in the store for his customers. He greeted me every time I walked in the store and offered me to try out different things. I'm not 100% sure but I think Frank cares and puts in effort to give you the best food and service possible. The staff at the store sometimes are not so friendly but they are knowledgeable and hard-working. Overall, although I do not have an Italian background, I think this is a nice place. If I lived near this place, I would go regularly.
**Ordered takeout during COVID pandemic  Food *Godfather Hero (Provolone, salami, pepperoni, ham cappy, mortadella, roasted red peppers (sweet), oil & vinegar) - good *Macaroni salad - good
Very good sandwiches.
Gotta love this place. What an Italian delicacy! I absolutely love the Paisano Hero! And they do offer whole wheat heroes and roll options!
The best Deli in NYC! If they don't have what your looking for (which is rare) they will get it for you. Really great staff and food is always fresh!

We ordered via Seamless. Sandwiches were so good, I ate half right away before pics because the smell was too enticing. Meat was fresh, cheese was still moist and delicious, great Italian semolina sub with the crispy crust and soft bread. Great all around sandwich and will order again.  Can't wait to visit in person and see everything on display!
This deli has everything you need for your cheeseboard, so fresh such nice quality. It truly is an little gem in this neighborhood ❣️
These guys are the one of best in the city, classic Italian pork store. The quality you can taste
Great place with wonderful staff!  They have a great variety of meets and cheeses.
Very good. Sandwich. I will definitely be back for  some Italian sausage.

Their Godfather sub is legit the best deli sandwich I’ve had since the Italian sub at Monica’s Mercato in Boston. I’d have taken a photo, but I was eating half a sub from each hand on the way to the train! #provolone #salami #pepperoni #capocollo #mortadella #roastedpeppers #hotpeppers #oilandvinegar  Also, their Pickled Eggplant!! Seriously

Wow, classic Italian deli and meat market. A real neighbourhood gem.  The selection is incredible and classic Italian... you can find almost all kinds of salami and similar products plus it's a mini supermarket too so you can get olive oil, breads, etc.
They ignore GrubHub drivers here. They wont pay no mind to them at all, they'll be standing around for 5 minutes not even being acknowledged by them, only being given dirty looks and attitude.
Best sandwich I've eaten in my entire life!

Great old-school Italian meat market and deli ...fresh cheeses are a delightful addition and they carry a great range of mostly Italian imports, with some other Mediterranean specials as well.  The meat is their claim to fame, and justifiably.. especially the sausages that are superb.  Service is always good and generally really helpful .... prices are very good, especially given their quality.
Finally stopped in for the first time after living nearby for 5 years and kicking myself for not going sooner. Amazing staff, amazing food, will be returning for sure.
Rated the second best deli in all New York City by USA Today! I give this place a thumbs up and would recommend all of my friends and family.
I love going here, they always have a smile and are willing to serve, theyre patient and cooperative. The food is delicious, great sandwiches and pasta and salad.
(Translated by Google) Italy in Astoria  (Original) Italia in Astoria

Every sandwich here is great. The component parts, from the bread to the balsamic, are top quality. I got the Cherry Bomb on a friend's recommendation - not my usual kind of sandwich but it was a well-balance umami-bomb. Staff friendly - which is rare for an NYC sandwich joint. The imported Italian foods look mouthwatering, too.
Hard to find imported italian products at affordable prices, I can't resist stopping by everytime when in the area.

Great little hidden gem in Astoria! I can’t walk past without going in for some fresh mozzarella and prosciutto. And they have a great selection of ready to cook food and seasoned meats. Friendly staff too!
One of the best chicken parms around! With the bakery next door you can grab dessert as well!

A gourmet delight. Fantastic sandwiches and take out items extremely well prepared. A myriad of wonderful imports from Italy. The owner and staff are very friendly, helpful. One hates to leave this market. You feel you are visiting one's relatives. Do not miss the opportunity to shop here you will feel well satisfied 😀
Local Italian butcher

1st time coming here. We got a winnie the pooh sub, veal parm sub, and a fried chicken caprese wrap. While we were waiting for our sandwiches, naturally our eyes were drawn to the cases and we felt compelled to order more! We also got the octopus salad, antipasto salad, fresh mozzerella w/ sundried tomatoes and garlic w/ spices, and chicken cordon bleu bites. EVERYTHING was top notch and so tasty. The guys behind the counter were friendly and helpful. This is a must go to place for REAL authentic fresh Italian yummies!

When I die from a gabagool induced heart attack I hope my ghost haunts this place.  Seriously though, this is my favorite place in all of Astoria. The sandwiches are incredible, the homemade sopressata is the best, the mozarella they make on-site is always fresh. If you bring it to a party you will probably cause your guests to have a fistfight over the last piece. Try a hero with chicken francese meatballs and broccoli rabe- you will cry tears of joy.  The staff is super friendly and they make you feel right at home.
The best place
amazing authentic Italian pork store / Deli. The best hero sandwiches i have ever had.

This is the best deli I've ever frequented. As a non-native New Yorker, this is exactly what I pictured when I moved here in regards to finding the quintessential Italian grocer/deli. Their heroes keep me coming back, and there are so many to choose from that I've yet to try the same one twice. And that's rare, because I usually stick with an order once I've fallen in love.
Amazing sandwiches, great friendly staff

It’s refreshing to see a meat shop that takes great pride in the products they serve. Their meats and cheese are always fresh, and offer the best in prime cuts and quality. I’ve been here on multiple occasions, buying items to cook fettuccine Alfredo, lasagna, chicken Marsala, penne alla vodka, or just assembling a meat and cheese platter for guests.  Their customer service is the best. The employees will go out of their way to make sure your experience and products are the best. They’ve always offered me free samples of various cured meats and cheeses while I’m there, definitely widening my palate for the foods they offer.  The difference that is made when purchasing fresh products from a butcher shop and a super market is pretty crazy. If I compare two of the same dishes, one made with Sorriso products and the other with supermarket products, hands down Sorriso will always win.  Definitely give this place a try. Very much worth it for the price and quality.

Sorisso's is an AMAZING deli and butcher shop. It's as authentic as it gets. Hands down the best Italian deli/specialty store I've found so far, and I'm picky! Their heroes are delicious (go for a Godfather or eggplant parm) and they always have the best meats, cheeses and appetizers (sun dried tomatoes, olives, stuffed peppers - you name it). Fresh homemade mozzarella. Braciole. Imports from Italy and many other European countries. Come for the experience - they'll give you samples and are genuinely excited to help you! It's a little bit on the pricey side, but you're paying for amazing quality - well worth splurging. Cash only.
Sorriso NEVER disappoints....Frank made me an incredible hero....he calls it "The Dinero".....How could I go wrong? Fugeddaboutit. 10 stars
Dirty sick place.
Hands down, my favorite deli in NYC, and the best Italian Deli in Queens. Get the Godfather sandwich or some rice balls and you will wish you were born into the family that runs this place.
Come here. Get a sandwich. Get some meat.  I had the grilled chicken wrap. Very good.  Will definitely come back here again.
Wow! Fresh & delicious
Very friendly and welcoming deli. Great house made sopreaseta

What a wonderful old-school Italian deli and butcher shop that I was just introduced to. They have a great selection. It seems like they’re most popular for their sandwiches which I can definitely see why. So good. So authentic. They also have a variety of prepared foods. We loved the eggplant rolatini. The soppressata is also amazing! Fresh mozzarella is good too. They also have a variety of unique cheeses which we’ll probably get next time. Very friendly and helpful staff too. We live about a mile away in Astoria but it’s worth walking to. Cash only.
One of the best chicken parm hero I've ever had. Delicous sauce and fresh hot chicken and enormous. The staff is one of the coolest very friendly

Helpful, professional, personable staff at this family-owned Italian foods shop. Amazing mozzarella made in-house daily, and there are about 120 other cheeses that can be sliced to order. Good, hearty sandwiches, a large selection of meats for cooking, prepared dishes, frozen dishes, housemade pasta sauces... Not to mention some locally made (in LIC) truffle salt, truffled olive oil and truffle honey, and Single Girl Cookies. A true paradise of Italian deli items and packaged goods like pastas, cookies, chips and crackers.
Best store in Astoria

Great staff and great food. I enjoy coming to Sorriso. The staff is very professional and courteous. Great selection of Italian food, gourmet meats and really great sandwiches. You will not regret making a trip there.
Amazing local pork store. Great prepared food. Primo chops. Outstanding advice on what to have for dinner. Superb customer service
More than just the Salumeria, there is an impressive array of Italian Imports that the owner has curated and is very proud of. No need to go to Eataly, we have it all right here in Queens.

Number 80 warm panini is out of this world: fried eggplant,  mozzarella,  pesto.  Lots to choose from. Real food (as well as various pastas, some frozen) to heat or cook at home, butcher dept, friendly service. Delicacies that are hard to find in local shops. Go!
Best salami I've tried in NYC. Super friendly staff. Love this place.
Bad food and bad attitude I ever see before!
Expensive, better options are available. Avoid if possible.
Very nice options and great people. Lots of samples from a very proud bunch with due reason.
This place is great. The staff are very friendly . The food is delicious!! I highly recommend to this place. One of the very few old school mom and pop kinda places like the way New York used to be.
Heavenly Imported Products!

I'm only rating from seamless--  Like everyone here  on Yelp the food is great! The quality is top tier and authentic. Now with that being said I'll go ahead and outline my experience here...  Food and delivery was great and on time. HOWEVER I was well aware of the $4 delivery fee the business required and tipped $2 to the driver for a $40 order. I find it to be utterly ridiculous that workers who deliver expect to be paid 15-18%. I shouldn't have to pay a cost of a meal for tip as he was requesting for.  Upon delivery and receipt of my order in hand, Mohamed prompted me "Miss, I drove here 15 minutes in a car and not a bicycle--$2? Really?". Hence blatant request for money. Now with that being said----  TIP IS OPTIONAL AND ITS YOUR JOB TO DRIVE  FOR A DELIVERY SERVICE. I shouldn't be tipping the driver $10 (price of a meal ONCE AGAIN) when he isn't a bartender or server which I am more than happy to reward actual experience of a particular service that I intentionally go-out of my way to ask for.  Really disappointed because the quality of food they have here is awesome. But obviously as it goes for any successful business model-the ratio weighs heavier upon service than the actual product. BECAUSE THAT IS WHAT BRINGS CUSTOMERS BACK.  Needless to say I do not suggest delivery unless your willing to pay some $$$ or expect harassment.
Great food with the wait
Fuhgetaboutit
Amazing .. I've lived here for 20years and I'm just trying it 💪
Sorriso has an excellent selection of Italian meats and cheeses, and the best fresh mozzarella and ricotta in Queens.  The staff are awesome:  super friendly and accommodating.

Excellent delivery service! superb Product! Beautiful and Professional Customer Care!!!! Highly recommended!  Ordered products from My home in NC and received in 2 days exactly what I requested with exceptional quality.
Nice and clean store,the homemade mozzarella is fantastic! Fuggetaboutit!!
Nicest people on the planet. Everything is outstanding, e.g. chicken parm, meatballs, lasagna, etc. The office goes here for lunch when we want to be really good to ourselves

When I moved to Queens within a walking distance from here, I was excited to find this place, with high hopes of replacing DiPalo's for my Italian meats and cheeses needs. Though Sorriso does make solid sandwiches, the quality/variety/and staff knowledge is nothing like DiPalo's or some other downtown stalwarts.
The sopressata made in store is amazing.
This place has awesome sausages, braciole, mozzarella and sandwiches. Everyone behind the counter is super friendly and helpful. So glad to have this spot in walking distance.
Sandwiches are great (get a Godfather) and you can get pre made food like lasagna and other Italian favorites
Everyone super friendly & great food
Best deli in town!! Service and food is exceptional. They provide better service than most restaurants.
Sal is very friendly and helpful mozzarella is the best. Great sausage and pepper hero
The homemade tomato sauce is delicious and has some kick to it.  The staff is friendly and you can tell they care about customers. They'll gladly offer samples as well.
Best sandwiches in Astoria. Best place for Italian food and ingredients. Great cheese and meat selection as well. The sopresatta is simply delicious.

I love this place as a general rule, but they had some aged steaks this week - shell and ribeye - that were OFF THE CHAIN. The best steaks I have had in memory. And I've been to Luger's, Morton's, Wolfgang's, whatever. I don't know where they source their beef, but I ran into the butcher from Frankel's there and he gave me the approving fist bump when he saw me buying those puppies.  Everyone who works there is knowledgable as hell. They'll tell you what's good that way, always give discounts to regulars, help you with your bags to the car. This is grade A, quality, specialty, gourmet food lovingly served by traditionalists and enthusiasts. This is the kind of store Mario Batali dreams of.  And a nice bakery across the street.
The best!
The best Italian salumeria in Astoria. Try the fresh mozarella and ricotta, it will change your life.

Top notch Italian specialty store by people who love their customers and are proud of their food. You don't shop at Sorriso, you have an experience there. Make sure you get a taste of their varieties of sopressata (made on premises), and one of the most spectacular things I've ever tasted, sun dried peppers.
THIS PLACE IS AWESOME
Italian combo with fresh mozzarella

One visit and I will be a lifelong customer. My girlfriend and I went to get some salami and fresh mozzarella for some salads, and left with a couple sandwiches and an assortment from the deli counter. Everyone was so nice and genuinely thrilled about the products they sell.  Get a Godfather. You will not regret it. We've been talking about it since we left.

I grew up in a very Italian neighborhood in Brooklyn and have never seen such pride under one roof. The owner of this establishment is so proud of his products that he hand makes on premises. The quality, flavor and diversity is incredible. It was a very pleasurable experience that I very much look forward to again. In my opinion, one of New York's true Diamonds.  He even has Manhattan Specials in the fridge!

Frank and his team have the most personal and friendly service and their has the true feelings and flavor of Italy, with the highest quality of produce. We lived in the neighborhood for 15 years and our stop at Sorriso on the weekends and after work was like visiting family. The food of course is outstanding and includes all the classics: great ribeye, homemade pasta, homemade sausage dried or fresh, prosciutto, mozzarella.  We cannot recommend Frank and this shop enough.  Happy eating!
Excellent sandwiches and the classic prosciutto balls.  Staff there always friendly and courteous.  The godfather or king of new York are incredible sandwiches
